915210.name: Fantasy Grounds - Devin Night: Tome of Beasts Pack 5 - Dust Goblin - Loxoda (Token Pack)
915210.description:
Devin Night: Tome of Beasts Pack 5 - Dust Goblin - Loxoda

Pack five from Kobold Press' Tome of Beast book.
This token pack includes:
  • Golem Dust
  • Golem Eye
  • Golem Hoard
  • Golem Salt
  • 2 Golem Smaragdine
  • Golem Steam
  • Gray Thirster
  • Gremlin Rum
  • Grim Jester
  • Gug
  • Hag Blood
  • Hag Red
  • Hag Sand
  • Harpy Owl
  • Haugbui
  • Herald of Blood
  • Herald of Darkness
  • Horakh
  • Hound of the Night
  • 2 Hulking Whelp
  • Hundun
  • Ice Maiden
  • Idolic Diety
  • Imy Ut Ushabti
  • Isonade
  • Jaculus
  • Kalke
  • Kikimora
  • Kobold Alchemist
  • Kobold Chieftan
  • Kobold Trapsmith
  • Kobold Worker
  • Kongamato
  • Koschei
  • Kot Bayun
  • 2 Krake Spawn
  • Lantern Dragonette
  • Lemurfolk
  • Leshy
  • Library Automaton
  • Lich Hound
  • Likho
  • Lindwurm
  • 2 Liosalfar
  • Living Wick
  • Lorelei
  • Loxoda
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
